content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This course is designed for content authors who would like to learn and understand the Marketo email marketing and content design platform. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Before starting this course, you will need to create a user account for Udemy, the learning platform where the course is based. This will allow you to keep track of your learning and course completion. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.udemy.com/join/signup-popup/?locale=en_US&response_type=html&next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.udemy.com%2Flogout%2F\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Create Account\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
